title: godoc craches on /­doc/­codewalk/­
body:
by **snilsson@nada.kth.se**: 
Run:
 godoc -http=":6060" &

Navigate to:
 http://localhost:6060/doc/codewalk/

Gives:
 panic: reflect.Value.Addr of unaddressable value

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

2f0fa51fa2da weekly/weekly.2011-04-27
